thread.title_full: Watch Lin-Manuel Miranda and Auli'i Cravalho perform How Far I’ll Go at the 2017 Oscars - The Verge

author: Lizzie Plaugic
title: Watch Lin-Manuel Miranda and Auli'i Cravalho perform How Far I’ll Go at the 2017 Oscars - The Verge
text: share Lin-Manuel Miranda and Auli’i Cravalho just took the stage at the Academy Awards to perform the song “How Far I’ll Go” from Disney’s Moana . Miranda opened the performance with a quick spoken-word intro before Cravalho finished it solo. You can watch it above. Moana was a classic Disney coming-of-age tale, but it was praised by critics for its impressive execution. And that included the music. Moana received one nomination tonight, for Best Animated Feature. Next Up In Culture
